title: Virtual Appliance - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: The Netskope Virtual Appliance can be used to steer traffic, as a log parser to discover cloud apps in your environment, or as a Dataplane On-Premises appliance (DPoP) to act as a proxy server. The following topics explain how to configure the virtual appliance in these modes.
